verbs.description: [V: pershing] [ARG0: square] announces investment in hilton worldwide holdings inc new york- business wire -oct 25 2018-pershing square capital management l p pscm today announced a new investment in hilton worldwide holdings inc hilton nyse hlt pscm has acquired 10 9 million shares of hilton representing a 3 7 stake in the company at its current market value this investment represents approximately 13 9 of the net asset value of pershing square holdings ltd ln psh ln pshd na psh and a substantially smaller percentage of the pscm private funds’ portfolios pershing square intends to discuss this investment in greater detail in its third quarter letter and investor call pershing square pershing square holdings pershing square capital management hilton worldwide hilton hilton worldwide holdings inc investment hilton worldwide holdings inc
